programme.desc: A woman heads back to her hometown on a mission to help save her father's annual Fall Fest, which is held on her family's pumpkin farm.

programme.desc: Always willing to fight for a just cause, Aimie Roarke chains herself to her town's beloved oak tree to stop the mayor from cutting it down. While attempting to outwait her, a handsome landscaper becomes close to her.

programme.title: October Kiss
programme.desc: After being hired as a nanny by a widowed, work-obsessed man, Poppy teaches the family that unconditional love, family and the joy of everyday occurrences are the most important things in life.

programme.title: My Argentine Heart
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a woman and her ex as they work together to save her family's ranch in Argentina.
